alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 1:58PM CDT until July 14 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR LINCOLN COUNTY... At 158 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Barnard to near Beverly to 8 miles southwest of Tescott to 10 miles south of Lincoln, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lincoln, Sylvan Grove, Beverly, Barnard, Westfall and Ash Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
